question: Which of the following is a characteristic of a good mobile strategy?

answers.text: Mobile websites should have a responsive design so visitors have a good user experience.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Unfortunately, marketers aren’t able to determine whether someone has seen a push notification on their device. Therefore, this does not qualify as a characteristic of a good mobile strategy. Push notifications are a great way to stay connected with users when they aren’t using the app.

answers.text: Emails should be sent to consumers on a weekly basis in order to stay engaged with mobile users.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Push notifications are a great way to stay connected with users when they aren’t using the app.

answers.text: Avoid using push notification features to avoid overcommunicating with your users.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Email frequency depends on the company and its marketing goals.

answers.text: Measure whether or not a mobile device user has seen a push notification.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: An important element of a good mobile strategy is ensuring that your website has a responsive design. Simply put, this means ensuring that menus and content are easy to read and that the user has a good experience on the site regardless of the device.

detailedSolution: An important element of a good mobile strategy is ensuring that your website has a responsive design. Simply put, this means ensuring that menus and content are easy to read and that the user has a good experience on the site regardless of the device.
